results.name: A007318 * a bidiagonal matrix with all 1's in the main diagonal and all 4's in the subdiagonal.
formula: Binomial transform of an infinite lower triangular matrix with all 1's in the main diagonal and all 4's in the subdiagonal (by columns, (1, 4, 0, 0, 0,...) in every column.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
